3
xx=0:0.01:1;pp=horner(p,xx);plot(xx,pp,'b');
s=sin((%pi*xx)/2);plot(xx,s,'r');
d1=horner(p,x)-sin(%pi*x/2);
d1=d1.^2;
d=sqrt(sum(d1)/size(d1,2));
